about_the_game:
Prepare for unforeseen consequences.

Half-Life 2: VR Mod - Episode Two is a community-made adaptation of Valve's episodic continuation of Half-Life 2, transformed into a fully roomscale Virtual Reality experience.

The White Forest awaits! Help Alyx deliver a vital piece of information to the resistance. Don your trusty HEV suit once more and do battle against the Combine forces. Face off against enemies old and new with your familiar arsenal of weapons and experience Episode Two like never before!

Features:
  • The same full room-scale VR experience you already know and love from the Half-Life 2: VR Mod, now available for Episode Two!
  • Intuitive and realistic weapon interactions, with quick and easy weapon switching via a radial menu, ammo storage over your shoulder, functional iron-sights, two-handed weapons, and manual reloading. Optional laser sight and an arcade style "quick reload" are available if desired.
  • Increase your level of immersion with newly added support for bHaptics vests.
  • Playable on any VR headset which is supported by SteamVR.
  • Optional support for bHaptics vests and ProVolver haptic pistols

Half-Life 2: VR Mod - Episode Two requires you to own the original Half-Life 2: Episode Two on Steam.

Half-Life 2: VR Mod - Episode Two is a community-developed modification and was not created by Valve Software.
detailed_description:
Install requirements

You must own the original Half-Life 2 (family sharing is not sufficient). You do not need to have the non-VR version installed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: Requires SteamVR-compatible headset and controllers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 8th gen / AMD Ryzen 3000
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: Requires SteamVR-compatible headset and controllers.
